name: Guardian of the Dreamplane
description:
Guardian of the Dreamplane

by fizzhog

24.08.2020

Made for Extra Credits Game Jam #6
Theme: 'Take care'

My take on the theme. You have to take care of a dreamwalker on the dreamplane. There's not a great deal to it; it's more of a prototype than anything else but it's all I could get done within the time.

Instructions in game.

Credits:

Graphics: Mine except for the characters (PVGames) and the portal between levels (Clickteam).

Sound: Adapted from sounds made by the following freesound users:
digifishmusic, klankbeeld, djgriffin, symphoid, unfa
